item.title: 弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥（Francis Scott Key Bridge）被一艘货轮撞击后坍塌，六名来自拉丁裔移民船员的工人被推定死亡。"他们是有家庭的父亲"他们是有家有室的父亲" "他们是每天来挣面包的人"
item.description:
Six workers from a crew of Latino immigrants are presumed dead after the Francis Scott Key Bridge was hit by a cargo ship and collapsed. “They’re fathers with families. They’re people who came to earn their bread each day.” https://t.co/0U9e06oV1B https://t.co/0U9e06oV1B

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 电视传奇人物鲍勃-巴克（Bob Barker）长期居住的好莱坞住宅即将上市，售价为 298.8 万美元。巴克在这所约 5000 平方英尺的房子里居住了 50 多年。
item.description:
The longtime Hollywood home of TV legend Bob Barker is coming on the market for $2.988 million. Barker lived in the roughly 5,000-square-foot house for more than 50 years. https://t.co/H8ybJ3Bj0v https://t.co/H8ybJ3Bj0v

item.title: 当史蒂夫-布西密离开纽约联邦储备委员会开始演艺事业时，他的父母非常紧张。"我爸爸会说，'那接下来怎么办？'我会说，'其实，我也不知道。他会说'哦，那你失业了'"
item.description:

item.title: 近 96% 的牙科保健师是女性。七分之六的律师是白人。律师助理、美发师和营养师的种族和民族构成与美国整体劳动力的构成非常接近。
item.description:
Almost 96% of all dental hygienists are women. Six out of seven lawyers are white. And the racial and ethnic makeup of paralegals, hairdressers and dietitians closely mirrors that of the overall U.S. workforce. https://t.co/9vcU8Jbwth https://t.co/9vcU8Jbwth

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登政府正以激进的监管阻碍人工智能的创新。@tedcruz和Phil Gramm写道：这可能使美国无法在人工智能领域占据全球领先地位，也无法实现这种领先地位所带来的繁荣。
item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：如果法院开始对食品及药物管理局的决定进行二次评判，将会延缓挽救生命的治疗方法的发展。无论您对堕胎持何种观点，米非司酮案都要求司法谦逊。
item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 27, 2024

item.title: 每年五月，冰岛农民都会将羊群放归野外。然后，在冬季来临之前，社区会聚集在一起，将羊群收回并分类。算是欢迎游客吧。
item.description:
Each year in May, Iceland’s farmers release sheep into the wild. Then before winter, communities come together to retrieve and sort them. Tourists are welcome, sort of. https://t.co/zJIUXslYh2 https://t.co/zJIUXslYh2

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024
